name: Inside Job
description:
In The Inside Job, players take on the role of a team of highly skilled thieves who are tasked with executing a daring bank heist. Equipped with a variety of modern firearms, players must work together to infiltrate the bank, neutralize any security threats, and make off with as much cash as possible.

The game takes place in a highly detailed and realistic virtual reality environment, putting players right in the middle of the action. Players can move freely throughout the bank, using cover and stealth to stay one step ahead of the Guards and Police.

With fast-paced action and intense shootouts, Inside Job offers a thrilling and immersive experience that will keep players on the edge of their seat. Whether they're sneaking through the shadows or engaging in full-on firefights, players must rely on their wits, their weapons, and their teamwork to succeed.

So, gear up with your virtual reality headset, grab your favorite modern firearms, and get ready for the ultimate bank heist experience in The Inside Job!

Demo Available NOW!

Multiplayer Coming Soon!

*** Available only on Oculus/Meta Quest 1 and 2 *** 

(This game contains depictions of fictional violence which may be upsetting to some viewers.)

NOTE

This is an .APK file which can be installed using SideQuest app.

For Support, please message or reach out on discord https://discord.gg/bTyWQu5

Donations help feed this project. The story mode is already 30% complete, multiplayer networking is almost complete as well.  This Demo May even work on LAN depending on your setup!

Enjoy!
